lines:
MM

1956

Emperial Medical College,

Tentsin, October

zud 109.

rad

Alfred. 2 starus Engr.

Phillips Academy 
Deart

Iwas very glad to have received 
you very muid letter og bue kot ago 
bekuowledgeng lee receipt olie feie heridred 
dollars to let accoul fruyén Ad Kian.

J'am quite confident that lie advautages 
of an American educalion under your good 
qudance will benefit le Chiese al lange, 
and le sensory jores Heide

y shall 
never be esasele 
lleat derwech their enlighteul or such a 
Christian like Principal as Yourse 
Euelosed hlease find a the

e hundred 
dollars for Un account

lecer

very tear

ya

son

Keleie de

You can

rely

AYU Kwan
raw: MM 1956 Emperial Medical College, Tentsin, October zud 109. rad Alfred. 2 starus Engr. Phillips Academy Deart Iwas very glad to have received you very muid letter og bue kot ago bekuowledgeng lee receipt olie feie heridred dollars to let accoul fruyén Ad Kian. J'am quite confident that lie advautages of an American educalion under your good qudance will benefit le Chiese al lange, and le sensory jores Heide y shall never be esasele lleat derwech their enlighteul or such a Christian like Principal as Yourse Euelosed hlease find a the e hundred dollars for Un account lecer very tear ya son Keleie de You can rely AYU Kwan

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter thanking Stearns for the acknowledgment of the $500 payment sent for his son. Kwan is confident that an American education will be valuable for China at large. The students are grateful for Stearns' energy and Christian-like demeanor.
